strategies.title: Simple Moving Average Crossover
strategies.description: Use a short SMA crossing a longer SMA to identify trend entries.
strategies.example: Buy when SMA(10) crosses above SMA(50).

strategies.title: RSI Pullback
strategies.description: Wait for RSI to dip near 30 during an uptrend and look for bullish divergence.
strategies.example: Enter on bullish RSI divergence and price support.

strategies.title: Breakout + Volume Confirmation
strategies.description: Trade breakouts on higher volume with a retest as confirmation.
strategies.example: Buy when price breaks resistance and retests support with volume spike.

strategies.title: Bollinger Band Mean Reversion
strategies.description: Fade moves to the outer Bollinger Bands when volatility is high.
strategies.example: Short near upper band with stop above recent swing high.

strategies.title: Support/Resistance Swing
strategies.description: Identify major support/resistance and trade bounces.
strategies.example: Buy on confirmed support bounce with tight stop.

strategies.title: Trend-Following ATR Trailing Stop
strategies.description: Use ATR-based trailing stops to let winners run while protecting capital.
strategies.example: Trail stop at 2 x ATR below entry for long trades.

strategies.title: Fibonacci Retracement Entry
strategies.description: Use Fibonacci levels to find low-risk entry areas during a trend.
strategies.example: Buy at 38.2â€“61.8% retracement with a confirm candle.

strategies.title: News Fade (Short-term)
strategies.description: After an initial spike from news, fade the overreaction if fundamentals don't support the move.
strategies.example: Wait for volatility to calm then take position with tight stop.

strategies.title: Carry Trade (FX)
strategies.description: Hold currencies with higher interest rates funded by lower-rate currencies.
strategies.example: Long high-yield currency vs. low-yield currency, manage risk with stop-loss.

strategies.title: Order Block / Market Structure
strategies.description: Align with institutional order blocks and market structure to find high probability entries.
strategies.example: Enter when price returns to an identified order block and structure supports it.

strategies.title: EMA Pullback with Trend Filter
strategies.description: Use EMA trend filter and wait for pullback to short EMA for entries.
strategies.example: When EMA(21) > EMA(50) look for pullbacks to EMA(21) as entries.

strategies.title: MACD Momentum Confirmation
strategies.description: Combine MACD histogram divergence with price structure for entries.
strategies.example: Look for MACD histogram changing direction near support/resistance.

strategies.title: High Probability Range Breakout
strategies.description: Trade breakouts after consolidation with confirmation (retest or volume).
strategies.example: Buy break of range high following retest and supportive volume.

strategies.title: Scalping with VWAP
strategies.description: Scalp intraday using VWAP as mean, quick entries with small targets.
strategies.example: Fade away from VWAP with quick target of few pips.

strategies.title: Mean Reversion with Stochastic
strategies.description: Use %K/%D stochastic signals at extreme levels to capture short-term reversals.
strategies.example: Enter when stochastic crosses from oversold area in uptrend.
